content.paragraph:
A chaotic first person party shooter where up to four players, out of ammo in a tense standoff, must scramble to grab and throw whatever objects they can find around the level until only one remains standing.
I was a designer, lead programmer, and team manager in a team 4 developers, with the goal of showcasing the game at Melbourne PAX 2023. I built the majority of the backend systems and assisted with implementing the frontend content (see Major Contributions below). I also gathered player feedback during development, and designed the Train Station level.
